articles.content: The shaded regions in this image show where the (fictional) impact is most likely to occur. There is a 99% chance the impact will be located within the outer contour, 87% inside the middle contour, a… [+7353 chars]

articles.author: Martina Bet
articles.title: Nicola Sturgeon crushed as rejection of UK dubbed 'perverse' by trade expert - Express
articles.description: NICOLA STURGEON's dream of taking Scotland out of the United Kingdom and into the European Union is 'perverse', a trade expert has told Express.co.uk.

articles.title: Ntamack and Dupont guide Toulouse into Champions Cup final - The Irish Times
articles.description: A fifth European title beckons as Top14 rivals Bordeaux fall short in maiden semi-final
articles.content:
Stade Toulousain 21 Bordeaux-Begles 9
Toulouse reached their first Heineken Champions Cup final since 2010 as they saw off Top 14 rivals Bordeaux-Begles 21-9 at Stade Ernest Wallon.

articles.title: In a NASA simulation of an asteroid impact, scientists concluded they couldn't stop a space rock from decimating Europe - Business Insider Australia
articles.description: Space agencies participated in a week-long NASA exercise in which they tried - and failed - to stop a fictitious asteroid from hitting Europe.
articles.content:
Scientists around the world have been bamboozled this week by a fictitious asteroid heading toward Earth.
